title: D/Cing in game with no movement or damage from other champions and minions
body: In game, I would get stuck at 70-110 ping. Then, minions and other champions would not take damage. For example, if I would be playing Poppy{{champion:78}}  top, I would Q on top of a Yasuo{{champion:157}} , he would take the damage, but no animation would show up. The creeps would also just pile up in lane, and sometimes not even move. I would have to wait in fountain till it stops or I would have to ult+f4. I also have issues with the league client. When logging in, I don't get game invites until I click "play" to reconnect myself  to the server. This has been happening for around 4 months. I have tried everything but getting new internet, which I really don't want to or need too. I will capture footage and screenshots if anyone is interested.  This happens on a regular basis.

replies.body:
What you're experiencing are common symptoms of *Packet Loss*, which occurs if there are problems between you and the servers. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to verify your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this after taking those steps so we can look into your network routing.
